name: 2 Pak Special Green: Alien Force / Hoppy
overview: Compilation featuring retitled versions of Imagic's "Cosmic Ark" (1982) and "Quick Step" (1983). Box description: ALIEN FORCE The Cosmic Ark races to bring back creatures from distant planets. The awesome Ark glides through alien space. Foes attack from every side. Destroy them - or be blasted! Reach strange and distant worlds. Send a satellite to capture the skittish beasties in your tractor beam. Your mission - to seek and save. For one or two players using joysticks. HOPPY Quick! Race against your opponent to claim possession of the multi-coloured trampolines. Jump on them and they change to your colour. Get there first! Be the last to touch the trampolines before they roll off the screen - you'll score big points. For one or two players using joysticks.
